tags.name: simplr-file-input
tags.description:
A File Input element From Simplr Components

Usage

<simplr-file-input name="files" multi label="Drag and Drop your files here"></simplr-file-input>

attributes.name: multi
attributes.description: Boolean stating if input allows multiple files to be chosen

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Boolean stating if input is disabled

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Boolean stating if input is required

attributes.name: invalid
attributes.description: Boolean set true when input has a invalid value

attributes.name: filehover
attributes.description: Boolean set true when a file is hovered on top of the field
